short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI powered assistant for solving algorithm challenges

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeGuide is your algorithm sidekick that guides your learning experience with intuitive and actionable feedback. By engaging with you, it suggests optimisations, and nudges you in the right direction. CodeGuide leans on conversational learning, working with you in real time through your input suggesting helpful ideas. It assess your skill level and recommends resources to help you improve.
